name: Verify Get Chatbot API when the env_id is invalid or missing -- @1.4

steps.name: Given User sends GET request to fetch chatbots with env_id "<script>alert('XSS')</script>"
When the user receives the response
Then error code should be 400 for bad request error
And response shows error message "Bad Request"
And the message should be "Invalid input:"

fullName: Verify Get Chatbot API: Verify Get Chatbot API when the env_id is invalid or missing
